version_description: • The game began to work even more reliably, because we found and fixed annoying crashes
• The game began to work even more reliably, because we found and fixed annoying crashes

Ladies and gentlemen, the Greens’ Manor gets caught in a web of intrigue:

• Lady Leanwood gets Jane involved in a love affair
• John de Ross and Mrs. Green share their childhood secrets with each other
• Mr. Applekin barely dodges Hill’s rake
• Regina Wroth fights a battle for maintaining traditions
• Important fixes of annoying bugs

Ladies and gentlemen, the Greens’ Manor gets caught in a web of intrigue:

• Lady Leanwood gets Jane involved in a love affair
• John de Ross and Mrs. Green share their childhood secrets with each other
• Mr. Applekin barely dodges Hill’s rake
• Regina Wroth fights a battle for maintaining traditions
• Important fixes of annoying bugs

Festival is about to end! Hurry up to finish your flower collection!

• New tricky and catchy levels
• Some errors have been fixed and the game has gotten a little bit better as usual!

Festival is about to end! Hurry up to finish your flower collection!

• New tricky and catchy levels
• Some errors have been fixed and the game has gotten a little bit better as usual!

Ladies and gentlemen, please hurry to the Greens’ manor, as...

• Jane suffers a devastating blow to her reputation
• Emma exposes Lady Wroth and Smudge’s conspiracy
• Young Miss Green starts learning the science of high society etiquette
• De Ross is deeply impressed by Mama’s steely character
• Hill creates a culinary masterpiece for Applekin

Ladies and gentlemen, please hurry to the Greens’ manor, as...

• Jane suffers a devastating blow to her reputation
• Emma exposes Lady Wroth and Smudge’s conspiracy
• Young Miss Green starts learning the science of high society etiquette
• De Ross is deeply impressed by Mama’s steely character
• Hill creates a culinary masterpiece for Applekin

Ladies and gentlemen, the Greens’ dinner party is about to begin. Be sure to join our characters, because:

• Richard Applekin flees from Regina Wroth’s house
• Jane finds out Joe’s innermost secret and decides to help him
• Joe tells the secret of James’ gift to Miss Green, which shocks her deeply
• Important fixes have also been implemented to ensure game stability

Ladies and gentlemen, the Greens’ dinner party is about to begin. Be sure to join our characters, because:

• Richard Applekin flees from Regina Wroth’s house
• Jane finds out Joe’s innermost secret and decides to help him
• Joe tells the secret of James’ gift to Miss Green, which shocks her deeply
• Important fixes have also been implemented to ensure game stability

Ladies and gentlemen, Christmas is just around the corner. It is a time when miracles occur and wishes are fulfilled. Let us celebrate with the Greens, because:

• They have prepared their sincerest seasons greetings, gifts, and a contest for you
• They hope you will help them pick the best evening outfit for Jane
• A Christmas avatar is waiting for those who appreciate unusual things

Ladies and gentlemen, the atmosphere in the mansion is heated to the extreme. Hurry up, because:

• Appleton takes charge of the Green family home
• Joe and Allan make peace
• Mr. Green is seriously concerned about Richard's intentions
• Slagger finds secret mail in a broken box

Ladies and gentlemen, January keeps surprising us, because you are in for... Another New Year celebration! This time, the Greens have decided to spend the holiday in an Oriental way by celebrating the Chinese New Year. Join the festivities:

• complete levels to get lanterns
• collect exquisite decorations from the new Oriental collection
• keep transforming the ballroom

Ladies and gentlemen, the Season of Hope is coming to Storyngton Hall:

• Complete levels and earn season points. Earn extra points for completing the level on your first attempt!
• Earn special prizes
• Get the Royal Card and get unique decorations and other rewards
• Find out how Jane and Allen rescued the ugly duckling

Ladies and gentlemen, the Greene Family Mansion is holding a ball in honor of Appleton. Please join us for a wonderful evening:

• Jane and Slagger learn of Edward's affairs from an old love letter
• Another hiding place under young Regina's portrait was discovered in the Green house
• Allen interrogates Mrs. Green about her true feelings for Richard
• Lady Wroth is losing her shape

Ladies and gentlemen, the Greene Family Mansion is holding a ball in honor of Appleton. Please join us for a wonderful evening:

• Jane and Slagger learn of Edward's affairs from an old love letter
• Another hiding place under young Regina's portrait was discovered in the Green house
• Allen interrogates Mrs. Green about her true feelings for Richard
• Lady Wroth is losing her shape

Ladies and gentlemen, Jane has a new challenge ahead of her! Mrs. Green is once again trying to make her daughter a true lady, this time with needle and thread. Jane cannot make it without your help:

• Earn puzzle pieces each time you win on the playing field
• Get ready for lots of rewards, but be careful: you can lose you progress if you lose a level
• Complete the puzzle to get a sofa cushion with an elegant embroidery

Ladies and gentlemen, spring has come to the Storyngton Hall manor, which means Easter is drawing near. Mama and Jane are baking sweet buns, while de Ross has come up with something even more exciting! Join our characters:

• Complete levels and win Easter eggs
• Merge gifts to exchange them for amazing prizes
• Find out who is going to solve de Ross's riddle and get a basketful of treats

• Complete levels and win Easter eggs
• Merge gifts to exchange them for amazing prizes
• Find out who is going to solve de Ross's riddle and get a basketful of treats

Ladies and gentlemen, Mrs. Green is worried again. You will not believe why! It is all because of another fashion trend, the sport of badminton. Our characters seem unable to do without you. Join the contest:

• Complete levels and earn rewards, but keep an eye on the clock
• Purchase a Royal Card and get lots of gifts for your club mates
• Find out who is going to win the family badminton tournament

Ladies and gentlemen, it is time for confidences and declarations in the Greens' manor. Join us asap because:

• Lady Wroth pays a visit to the manor
• Appleton makes a stunning declaration
• Allen begins to listen to Stylett's advice

• Lady Wroth pays a visit to the manor
• Appleton makes a stunning declaration
• Allen begins to listen to Stylett's advice

Ladies and gentlemen, Spring has come to the Green family estate and Mama has decided to give in to the whims of the Spring mood:

• Collect buds by completing levels
• Combine gifts, complete tasks, and decorate the ballroom
• Help Mama pick out a dress and learn about her very first kiss!

• Collect buds by completing levels
• Combine gifts, complete tasks, and decorate the ballroom
• Help Mama pick out a dress and learn about her very first kiss!

Ladies and gentlemen, it is time for revelations and declarations in the Greens' manor. Join us asap because:

• Lady Wroth is paying a visit to the manor
• Appleton is making a stunning declaration
• Mrs. Green is suffering from melancholy, and Hill is waiting for your help to bake the Royal Cake to lift Mama's spirits

Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Green and Mr. de Ross invite you on a hunt. Join as quickly as possible:

• Purchase a royal card and try on the brave hunter’s outfit
• Complete levels and win to get a hunter’s chest with gifts
• Be the first to find out what dish Mr. de Ross cooked over the campfire

• Purchase a royal card and try on the brave hunter’s outfit
• Complete levels and win to get a hunter’s chest with gifts
• Be the first to find out what dish Mr. de Ross cooked over the campfire

Ladies and gentlemen, the events that unfold at the Green residence are just like a real detective story! Hurry up to where:

• The household members prepare a surprise for Jane’s birthday secretly, while the players can expect a huge box of gifts and a new dress for the birthday girl
• Lady Wroth grills Appleton thoroughly
• De Ross tries to uncover the true reason of Lord Wroth’s untimely passing
• Mr. Green receives an anonymous letter
